c1.name: Conviction
c1.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.

c2.name: Searing Ember
c2.effect: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10%, and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Last for 10s. This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c3.name: Steel and Fire
c3.effect: Increases Searing Onslaught's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Flowing Flame
c4.effect: Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt. Within 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.

c5.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
c5.effect: Increases Dawn's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark
c6.effect: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
